nodes.text: Brent Spiner (born February 2, 1949) is an American actor best known for his portrayal of Lieutenant Commander Data in the television series Star Trek: The Next Generation, as well as four subsequent feature films. He portrayed Senator-in-exile Gall Trayvis in "Rise of the Old Masters," the third episode of the first season of the animated television series Star Wars Rebels.

He previously collaborated with Rebels writer Greg Weisman on the animated series Gargoyles and Young Justice. In the former, he had the recurring role of the Shakespearean character Puck, while in the latter he made a guest appearance as the Batman villain the Joker.
